reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is in an excellent location, just a few minutes walk from the main attractions. Our room was a corner room so was probably larger than most, and faced the street which was a little noisy. Tea and coffee making facilities are available in the room, and free Wifi in the lobby. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable.
reviews.title: Good clean and functional hotel

reviews.text: The hotel has a car park, that was a little difficult to find as it was not well signposted. You need to drive on what appears to be the pedestrian entrance to the hotel, and press the button to raise the shutter/ barrier and you pay at reception on exit.
reviews.title: Good location and good breakfast

reviews.text: Good hotel located near leuven center, very close to all restaurants and bars. Breakfast was included, with good, fresh and quality itens. Rooms and shower are also good, everything seems pretty new. Free wi-fi on the lobby, which is useful. I´ve stayed before on Novotel, but, even though Novotel was also good, Mercure is a better choice, mainly due to is location. 15 min walk from leuven station.
reviews.title: Pubic Hairs all over bathroom, AVOID!

reviews.text: 16€ to park per night... RIP OFF!

reviews.text: Previously stayed in '08 when this hotel was Holiday Inn Garden Court.
reviews.title: Return Visit - Good Hotel

reviews.text: Really good central location. Good value for money and Willem and other staff are very efficient and friendly. The hotel has a limited menu but the food is good and not expensive. The rooms are clean and well apportioned. Good base for a couple of days and I would stay again if I'm in this area.
reviews.title: Nice location and service; rooms so so

reviews.text: The hotel has free wifi in reception and secure underground parking.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: watch out - there is a lot of building work in Leuven until March 2012 and many of the city centre roads (many of them one way) are blocked off with no diversion. Unless you've been there before phone the hotel for directions around the roadworks.
reviews.title: Average hotel
Great location - apparently best of the hotels in Leuven
reviews.text: Stayed for 4 nights on business in April 2011. Staff very friendly,especially at breakfast.

reviews.title: Very centrally located, air conditioned.
reviews.text: Hotel is quite 'tired' and could do with updating. I had an interconnecting room and could hear my neighbour on the phone until quite late. Bathroom in need of replacing. I love to bathe but the bath itself did not look clean enough so I showered instead. Nothing special about the hotel but my colleagues have stayed in a few hotels in Leuven and say this is the best. Great location for restaurants ect.
